net.akaish.kitty.orm.annotations

Annotation Type KITTY_DATABASE


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface KITTY_DATABASE
    Created by akaish on 04.02.18.
    Author:
    akaish (Denis Bogomolov)

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String databaseName
      Database name
      int databaseVersion
      Database version int
      java.lang.String[] domainPackageNames
      Package name where schema classes are
      boolean isGenerateRegistryFromPackage
      Create modelMapperInstanceStorage by default method (via reflection)
      boolean isKittyDexUtilLoggingEnabled
      Enable logging for dex util component (false by default)
      boolean isLoggingOn
      Enable logging (false by default)
      boolean isPragmaOn
      Pragma on value (by default false)
      boolean isProductionOn
      Production flag (default true), when true and logging on than models would be logged as well as CV values with KittyMapper with usage of KittyModel.toLogString().
      java.lang.String logTag
      Log tag (KittySQLite by default)

    • Element Detail

      • databaseName

        public abstract java.lang.String databaseName
        Database name
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • databaseVersion

        public abstract int databaseVersion
        Database version int
        Returns:
        Default:
        1

      • isLoggingOn

        public abstract boolean isLoggingOn
        Enable logging (false by default)
        Returns:
        Default:

      • isKittyDexUtilLoggingEnabled

        public abstract boolean isKittyDexUtilLoggingEnabled
        Enable logging for dex util component (false by default)
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • logTag

        public abstract java.lang.String logTag
        Log tag (KittySQLite by default)
        Returns:
        Default:
        "KittySQLiteORM"

      • isPragmaOn

        public abstract boolean isPragmaOn
        Pragma on value (by default false)
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • isProductionOn

        public abstract boolean isProductionOn
        Production flag (default true), when true and logging on than models would be logged as well as CV values with KittyMapper with usage of KittyModel.toLogString().
        Be sure to turn it off on production cause that may be potential threat for your's application
        user's private data, cause it would be outputted to serial console when production OFF!
        Returns:
        Default:
        true

      • isGenerateRegistryFromPackage

        public abstract boolean isGenerateRegistryFromPackage
        Create modelMapperInstanceStorage by default method (via reflection)
        Returns:
        Default:
        true

      • domainPackageNames

        public abstract java.lang.String[] domainPackageNames
        Package name where schema classes are
        Returns:
        Default:
        "net.akaish.kittyimp.schema"
